FuncDef: This command configures the mode of OAM operation for this Ethernet port. These two modes differ in that active mode causes the port to continually send out efm-oam info PDUs while passive mode waits for the peer to initiate the negotiation process. A passive mode port cannot initiate monitoring activities (such as loopback) with the peer.

ParaDef.Info: Provides capability to initiate negotiation and monitoring activities.
Relies on peer to initiate negotiation and monitoring activities.
